abstract: Sometimes media metrics and audiences have very different views of what works.
snippet: Sometimes media metrics and audiences have very different views of what works.
lead_paragraph: The most-cited measure of a Super Bowl ad’s performance is the “Ad Meter,” a 20-year-old metric created by USA Today. Every year, the newspaper asks a panel of volunteers to watch the ads while twiddling dials to reflect their reactions; last year, the 238 panelists anointed a Bud Light spot, featuring beer-thieving crabs, as the year’s top Super Bowl ad.

headline.main: Best Ad? Bowl Fans and TiVo Clash
headline.print_headline: Best Ad? Bowl Fans and TiVo Clash
